document.full_text: a middle-aged man accused of killing a 15-year-old boy in 1969, when he was a teen himself, pleaded not guilty to perjury charges on tuesday and will face murder charges in juvenile court.
document.title: middle aged man due in juvenile court for 1969 murder
lines_and_colors: a middle-aged man accused of killing a 15-year-old boy in 1969, when he was a teen himself, pleaded not guilty to perjury charges on tuesday and will face murder charges in juvenile court.
